DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , single center , ascend single dose study evaluate safety , tolerability , PK HTD1801 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥18 ≤ 50 year 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18.0 ≤ 30.0 kg/m2 3 . Current nonuser nicotine contain product ( > 6 month ) 4 . Females must nonpregnant nonlactating , either surgically sterile ( e.g. , tubal occlusion , hysterectomy , bilateral salpingectomy , bilateral oophorectomy ) postmenopausal ≥12 month . Acceptable method contraception use condom effective contraceptive female partner include : surgical sterilization ( e.g. , bilateral tubal ligation ) , hormonal contraception , intrauterine contraception/device ) .
